- [93mIntroducing[0m [93mSingle[0m [93mPd[0m [93mAtoms[0m into a [93mTwo[0m-[93mDimensional[0m [93mMetal[0m-[93mOrganic[0m [92mFramework[0m for [93mEnhanced[0m [93mBenzene[0m [93mVapor[0m [93mDetection[0m.: [93mWe[0m [93mreport[0m the [92mdesign[0m and [93msynthesis[0m of a [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m [93mporphyrinic[0m [93mmetal[0m-[93morganic[0m [92mframework[0m ([93mMOF[0m), [93mAl[0m-[93mTCPP[0m-[93mPd[0m, which [93mincorporates[0m [93matomically[0m [93mdispersed[0m [93mpalladium[0m [93msites[0m for [93multrasensitive[0m [93mbenzene[0m [93mvapor[0m [93mdetection[0m. [93mCompared[0m with [93mpristine[0m [93mAl[0m-[93mTCPP[0m and [93mAl[0m-[93mTCPP[0m-[93mAl[0m [93manalogs[0m, [93mAl[0m-[93mTCPP[0m-[93mPd[0m [93mexhibits[0m [93msuperior[0m [93mperformance[0m with an [93mactual[0m [93mdetection[0m [93mlimit[0m of [93m1[0m [93mppb[0m ([93mlogic[0m [93mLOD[0m is [93m0[0m.[93m48[0m [93mppb[0m) and a [93mresponse[0m [93mvalue[0m that is [93mfour[0m [93mtimes[0m [93mhigher[0m than [93mAl[0m-[93mTCPP[0m at [93m1[0m [93mppm[0m [93mbenzene[0m [93mconcentration[0m. This [93mremarkable[0m [93msensitivity[0m is [93mattributed[0m to a [93msynergistic[0m [93mmechanism[0m [93minvolving[0m [93mgeometric[0m [93mconfinement[0m within the [93mMOF[0m'[93ms[0m [93mrectangular[0m [93mpores[0m and [93mπ[0m-[93melectron[0m [93mchannel[0m [93menhancement[0m [93minduced[0m by [93mPd[0m [93mcoordination[0m. These [93mresults[0m [93munderscore[0m the [93meffectiveness[0m of [93mnoble[0m [93mmetal[0m [93msingle[0m-[93matom[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m in [93menhancing[0m [93mMOF[0m-[93mbased[0m [93msensor[0m [93mperformance[0m and [93moffer[0m a [93mmodular[0m [92mframework[0m for [92mdesigning[0m.
- [93mAg[0m [93mNPs[0m [93mloading[0m and [93multraviolet[0m [93mirradiation[0m [93mstrategies[0m for [93menhancing[0m the [93mperformance[0m of [93mWO[0m([93m3[0m)/[93mTi[0m([93m3[0m)[93mC[0m([93m2[0m)[93mT[0m([93mX[0m) [93mcomposites[0m in [93mdetecting[0m [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m.: As a [93mtypical[0m [93mvolatile[0m [93morganic[0m [93mcompound[0m ([93mVOC[0m), [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m [93mdetection[0m is [93mcritical[0m in [93mfood[0m [93mspoilage[0m [93mmonitoring[0m, [93mchemical[0m [93mproduction[0m [93msafety[0m [93mcontrol[0m, and [93menvironmental[0m [93mpollutant[0m [93mtracking[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mdeveloping[0m a [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m [93mgas[0m [93msensor[0m with [93mhigh[0m [93msensitivity[0m at [93mroom[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mremains[0m [93mchallenging[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mprepared[0m [93mWO[0m [93m3[0m /[93mTi[0m [93m3[0m [93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mT[0m [93mX[0m [93mMXene[0m [93mcomposites[0m ([93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m) [93mvia[0m a [93msolvothermal[0m [93mmethod[0m and [92mconstructed[0m a [93mternary[0m [93mcomposite[0m [93mAg[0m/[93mWO[0m [93m3[0m /[93mTi[0m [93m3[0m [93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mT[0m [93mX[0m -[93m50[0m ([93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m) by [93mloading[0m [93mAg[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m. The [93mgas[0m-[93msensing[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m, [93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m, and [93mWT[0m-[93m50[0m [93mexcited[0m by [93multraviolet[0m [93mlight[0m [93mtoward[0m [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m were [95minvestigated[0m. [93mAgWT[0m-[93m50[0m [93mexhibits[0m a [93mhigh[0m [93mresponse[0m of [93m4[0m.[93m62[0m to [93m55[0m.[93m04[0m [93mppm[0m [93m2[0m-[93mheptanone[0m at [93mroom[0m [93mtemperature[0m, with [93mexcellent[0m [93mselectivity[0m and [93mstability[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mstrategy[0m for [93mdeveloping[0m [93mroom[0m-[93mtemperature[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mgas[0m [93msensors[0m, [93mshowing[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mapplication[0m [93mpotential[0m in [93mfood[0m [93mquality[0m [93mcontrol[0m, [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mprotection[0m, and [93menvironmental[0m [93msafety[0m [93mfields[0m.
